Announcements

Week 2 Announcements

Aug 29 · 0 min read
  • Homework 01 was released on 8/25 and is due on Wednesday, August 31st at 11pm. You can get 5 points of extra credit if you submit the homework by Tuesday, August 30th at 11pm
  • Lab 02 will be released on Monday and is due by Friday (9/2) at 11pm for students enrolled in Mega Lab.
  • Regular office hours (including instructor office hours) begin this week.
